DESCRIPTION:
Continuation of the famous "puzzle first person" Portal, awarded the title of "Game of 2007" more than thirty foreign and Russian specialized publications.
Upon completion of the events in the first game, it took several hundred years. Rousing himself, the protagonist Chell finds that all this time was in a state of suspended animation near the broken Laboratory studies on the nature of portals. She meets one of the modules personalities GLeDOS - Whitley, who offers the freedom of using a rescue capsule. But the power-mad supercomputer GLeDOS very different plans for Chell.
In Portal 2 players waiting for more puzzles, jokes and bold experimentation. Will have to overcome obstacles, as before, using portal, but now you can use gels that improve the speed and increase the range of jumps, as well as reflecting the laser cubes, gidrotruby and other strange objects.
For those who wanted to get Portal to friends, appeared co-op mode, where you can control two robots. They are not peculiar pride, they do not know fear & they do not know anything. Team-mates will have to robots through the insane obstacles, created GLeDOS, and find out what is their purpose.

Do not recoded / no cut
